sentences.en: " You're as slow as molasses in January,'snapped Scarlett as Prissy opened the gate.
sentences.cn: " 你可是冬天的糖浆,好,糊啊! " 百里茜一进大门,思嘉便厉声批评她.

sentences.en: A better natural substitute would be Manuka honey or molasses but only in very small amounts.
sentences.cn: 一个天然替代品是麦卢卡蜂蜜或者糖蜜，但是也只能非常小的量。

sentences.en: A hard , chewy candy made of brown sugar or molasses and butter.
sentences.cn: 爆米花和稠糖或糖蜜、焦糖糖浆混合, 抟成球.

sentences.en: A very soft steamed sponge cake flavoured with molasses.
sentences.cn: 一种非常软的加入糖浆的海绵蒸糕.

sentences.en: Add the melted butter, molasses, salt, and flour.
sentences.cn: 加入化开的黄油、糖浆、盐和面粉。

sentences.en: Air, water, molasses, and milk are all fluids.
sentences.cn: 空气 、 水 、 糖蜜及牛奶都是流体.

sentences.en: Applicable for addition of molasses, oil , fat, etc to compound feed.
sentences.cn: 该机适用于配合饲料中添加糖蜜 、 油脂等液体营养成分.

sentences.en: But if you add sugar and molasses, you can cook them for days.
sentences.cn: 但是如果你加入糖和糖浆，你能煮好几天。

sentences.en: Exports: sugar and molasses , rum, other foods and beverages, chemicals.
sentences.cn: 出口: 糖, 朗姆酒, 食品及饮料, 化工.

sentences.en: He poured milk and molasses into a bowl.
sentences.cn: 他把牛奶和糖浆倒入一只碗内.

sentences.en: In this paper, the ultrafiltration ( UF ) process of cane molasses was investigated.
sentences.cn: 本文研究甘蔗糖蜜溶液的超滤过程特性.

sentences.en: Molasses are mildly laxative and something of a general tonic.
sentences.cn: 糖蜜有些许通便作用，兼具强身功能。

sentences.en: Molasses is not an easy ingredient to mix into concentrated feeds.
sentences.cn: 糖蜜作为一种饲料成分与精料混合并不容易.

sentences.en: Mother poured milk and molasses into a bowl.
sentences.cn: 母亲将牛奶和糖蜜倒进碗里.

sentences.en: Resource regeneration of molasses has become research hotspot.
sentences.cn: 摘要糖蜜的资源化利用一直受到人们的重视.

sentences.en: To a bacterium water is as thick as molasses is to us.
sentences.cn: 对于细菌来说,水的粘稠度就好像糖蜜对人的粘稠度一样.

sentences.en: What’s more, the Earth’s rotation should also produce a drag on local spacetime, like a marble spinning in molasses would pull the goop around it.
sentences.cn: 而且，自转的地球也会对周围的时空产生一个拽引力，就像一颗弹珠在糖浆中旋转可以带动它周围的液体。

trans.tran_en: a thick dark sweet liquid that is obtained from raw sugar plants when they are being made into sugar
